subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: Due to {{w|Han unification}}, the {{w|Traditional Chinese|traditional form}} containing {{l|mul|冊}} and {{w|Simplified Chinese|simplified form}} containing {{l|mul|册}} (used in mainland China and Korea for this character) are encoded under the same [[code point]]. Depending on the font installed, this character may appear to be either <font size=4.5, lang="zh-hant">跚 </font> or <font size=4.5, lang="zh-hans">跚</font>.
